content.name: remoteInterface
content.description: All local and remote replication interfaces from all remote system connection configurations.

attributes.name: capability
attributes.description:
This property indicates the capability of the interface for replication sessions Values are:
  • 0 - interface is capable of participating in SYNC replication sessions
  • 1 - interface is capable of participating in ASYNC replication sessions
  • 2 - interface is capable of participating in both SYNC and ASYNC replication sessions

attributes.name: node
attributes.description: SP or node owning this interface.

attributes.name: remoteId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the remoteInterface instance as is from remote system.

attributes.name: address
attributes.description: IP address of the remote interface.

attributes.name: remoteSystem
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the remote system, as defined by the remoteSystem resource type.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique global identifier of the remoteInterface instance. This is combination of system serial number and the instance id as is from the remote system.
